ThingDef.label: feathered wings
ThingDef.description: By creating wings that are powerful enough to keep one aloft, but small enough to not intrude upon daily life, we have created a way to rapidly increase our speed.

ThingDef.label: tentacle cluster
ThingDef.description: Adding a small amount of manipulator tentacles on our backs can increase our ability to work.

ThingDef.label: musculature braces
ThingDef.description: Adding extra bands of muscle, as well as supporting bone to connect to, allows the host to hit harder and carry more.
